properties.name: groupSize2
properties.summary: second grouping, where separators 2..n have a different interval than the first separator (for India)

properties.name: separator
properties.summary: The character used as the thousands separator. Default is no separator. For more than one symbol use an array, e.g. [",", ""], makes ',' optional.

properties.name: signed
properties.summary: The leading plus-or-minus sign. Can be true, false, or [true,false]. Default is [true, false], (i.e. will match if it is signed or unsigned).
